M

Main - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the main class of an emulator for the Motorola MC6809 microprocessor
This class contains the main method which launches the graphical user interface, giving user access to the program functions
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
The main method sets the GUI class to visible
MemoryHandling - Class in <Unnamed>
This class maintains a list representing the 65536 memory locations and provides methods to access and manipulate them along with a routine for handling each operation code
MemoryHandling(AccumulatorA, AccumulatorB, AccumulatorD, ProgramCounter, CCR, IndexX, IndexY, HardwareStackPointer, UserStackPointer, DirectPage) - Constructor for class MemoryHandling
default constructor to instantiate array of empty memory objects and set reserved memory locations
modifyArray() - Method in class GraphicalUserInterface
method to process modify array
